capybaras.name: Daisy
capybaras.description: Daisy is a friendly and laid-back capybara with a gentle nature. Her soft, brown fur and big, soulful eyes make her instantly lovable. Daisy enjoys lounging by the water, often seen soaking up the sun or happily wading in shallow streams.

capybaras.name: Flint
capybaras.description: Flint is an adventurous and spirited capybara with a bold streak. His sleek, dark brown fur and bright, curious eyes make him stand out in any crowd. Always on the move, Flint loves to explore new places, whether it’s navigating through dense grass or splashing around in the water.

capybaras.name: Haku
capybaras.description: Haku is a gentle and curious capybara with a soft, chocolate-brown coat and a calm demeanor. Haku enjoys lounging by the water, nibbling on fresh grass, and occasionally soaking up the sun with his animal friends.

capybaras.name: Lily
capybaras.description: Lily is a gentle and curious capybara with a soft, chocolate-brown coat and a calm demeanor. Always seen lounging by the water or strolling through the grass, Lily enjoys the company of friends and is particularly fond of basking in the sun.

reviews.body: I recently purchased a plushy and a sticker, and I'm super happy with both!

comments.body: Daisy the capybara was an absolute delight!
I had the absolute pleasure of meeting Flint the capybara, and let me tell you, he’s a total gem!
Meeting Haku the capybara was an experience I’ll never forget! From the moment I laid eyes on him, his serene presence instantly made me feel at peace.
Lily the baby capybara is an absolute bundle of joy! Despite being a little ball of energy, she’s super friendly
